content.html: The MAGAs who mock racial justice as being “woke” meanwhile name their orgs “Awake” and their events “The Awakening.” It’s like they found a way to parody themselves while being oblivious to their own parody.
content.value:
The MAGAs who mock racial justice as being “woke” meanwhile name their orgs “Awake” and their events “The Awakening.”

It’s like they found a way to parody themselves while being oblivious to their own parody.
